You know I want to beat up, castrate and chop off the limbs of that che son of a bitch, Takeshi too. But more than that, I want to beat the crap out of Mitsuru for being so oblivious right from the start. In Chapter 2, I was shocked that he just acted like nothing's wrong when seeing your sister sweating profusely, wearing only panties underneath and your "best friend" in his underwear also sweating like a dog. If it were me, I would have been pissed off and my switch thrown off the handle. I would have shouted in anger that not only was he here to take advantage of my sister but also the gall to do it in my house. My house, where I grew up in, how fucking dare you. I would have killed him, made sure his face was unrecognizable, chop off his limbs into pieces when he gets sent off in the casket. I would spit on the ground in front of his mother for birthing this scum. "What the fuck about my family when he took advantage of my sister, you old crone? He was my 'friend' until he wasn't."

@Mr. Ero-Jin It is NTR Netorare is having your loved one taken or stolen from you. So yeah is right to call this one Netorare even thought the sisters and the brother are not lovers.

You know I gotta ask.

People keep saying their projecting themselves as people who steal other people's loved one's and say that's the fix to make this story better.

Are they fucking mentally alright?

Why on earth would you project yourself as someone like that?

What the hell is wrong with you to think that's even a good excuse to say this is good and that's a good way to enjoy this?

To the ones who repeatedly ask why this is NRT

NTR is defined as stealing someone's loved ones from them.

Baldy has the full intention to emotionally torment the poor kid and show him he stole his sister's from him and that was the only reason he even got close to him in the first place.

So why are you asking why this is NTR?

This isn't Netori either as that is usually shown as the MC having a reason to steal the loved one like he was too late to confess his feeling or the woman/man in questions is unsatisfied or being hurt in anyway by their so called loved one.

This is nothing like that.
